smoothskies.configuration.title: Smooth Skies
smoothskies.configuration.distance.toolt: Set a custom view distance for the skybox fog. Higher numbers mean bluer skies.
smoothskies.configuration.lowerSkyVoidDa: Lowers the required height for the sky to turn black to the world's lowest height. This prevents the sky turning black at a high Y value. Most noticeable in Skyblock-type worlds.
smoothskies.configuration.clearSkies.too: Removes banding on the horizon, making the sky one uniform color.
